AI Description: Trax is a deep learning library that focuses on clear code and speed. It is designed to deliver scalable and efficient machine learning with emphasis on flexibility and speed of experimentation.
Core Features: Trax offers a modular deep learning framework that enables rapid prototyping with high performance. It provides a library of layers, models, optimizers, and supports automatic differentiation. Trax also includes JAX backend for accelerated numerical computing and high-performance machine learning.
